DOC.brief_summary: The effect physical exercise pregnancy remain elucidate . A randomized control trial conduct study impact exercise maternal perinatal outcome . Our hypothesis physical exercise reduces preeclampsia incidence improves birthweight start early pregnancy , impact pregnancy duration , Apgar score neonatal complication .
DOC.detailed_description: The study include low risk pregnant woman randomize practice physical exercise begin 13 week , 20 week exercise group . The objective : 1 . To describe compare biological obstetrical variable . 2 . To study doppler flow velocimetry index . 3 . To determine association physical exercise maternal complication : preeclampsia , preterm labor , gestational diabetes weight gain pregnancy . 4 . To determine association physical exercise perinatal outcome : Apgar score , birthweight , admission intensive neonatal care unit , body composition neonatal complication .
DOC.criteria: Gestational age < 13 week Single pregnancy Alive fetus No previous practice physical activity Smoking Chronic maternal disease Placenta praevia History preterm labor Bleeding
